Package com.ibm.fhir.persistence.jdbc.util

Class SortedQuerySegmentAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.fhir.persistence.jdbc.util.SortedQuerySegmentAggregator
  • public class SortedQuerySegmentAggregator
extends Object
    This class assists the JDBCQueryBuilder. It extends the QuerySegmentAggregator to build a FHIR Resource query that produces sorted search results.

      • SortedQuerySegmentAggregator

        protected SortedQuerySegmentAggregator​(Class<?> resourceType,
                                       int offset,
                                       int pageSize,
                                       ParameterDAO parameterDao,
                                       ResourceDAO resourceDao,
                                       List<SortParameter> sortParms)
        Constructs a new SortedQuerySegmentAggregator
        Parameters:
        resourceType - - The type of FHIR Resource to be searched for.
        offset - - The beginning index of the first search result.
        pageSize - - The max number of requested search results.
        ResourceDAO - - A FHIR DB Data Access Object
        sortParms - - A list of SortParameters

    • Method Detail

      • buildQuery

        public SqlQueryData buildQuery()
                        throws Exception
        Builds a complete SQL Query based upon the encapsulated query segments and bind variables. This query contains the necessary clauses to support sorted search results. A simple example query produced by this method: SELECT R.RESOURCE_ID,MIN(S1.STR_VALUE) FROM Patient_RESOURCES R JOIN Patient_LOGICAL_RESOURCES LR ON R.LOGICAL_RESOURCE_ID=LR.LOGICAL_RESOURCE_ID JOIN Patient_TOKEN_VALUES P1 ON P1.RESOURCE_ID=R.RESOURCE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN Patient_STR_VALUES S1 ON (S1.PARAMETER_NAME_ID=50 AND S1.RESOURCE_ID = R.RESOURCE_ID) WHERE R.RESOURCE_ID = LR.CURRENT_RESOURCE_ID AND R.IS_DELETED <> 'Y' AND P1.RESOURCE_ID = R.RESOURCE_ID AND (P1.PARAMETER_NAME_ID=196 AND ((P1.TOKEN_VALUE = false))) GROUP BY R.RESOURCE_ID ORDER BY MIN(S1.STR_VALUE) asc NULLS LAST OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 100 ROWS ONLY;
        Returns:
        SqlQueryData - contains the complete SQL query string and any associated bind variables.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • addQueryData

        protected void addQueryData​(SqlQueryData querySegment,
                            Parameter queryParm)
        Adds a query segment, which is a where clause segment corresponding to the passed query Parameter and its encapsulated search values.
        Parameters:
        querySegment - A piece of a SQL WHERE clause
        queryParm - - The corresponding query parameter

      • buildCountQuery

        protected SqlQueryData buildCountQuery()
                                throws Exception
        Builds a complete SQL count query based upon the encapsulated query segments and bind variables.
        Returns:
        SqlQueryData - contains the complete SQL count query string and any associated bind variables.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • buildSystemLevelQuery

        protected SqlQueryData buildSystemLevelQuery​(String selectRoot,
                                             String subSelectRoot,
                                             boolean addFinalClauses)
                                      throws Exception
        Build a system level query or count query, based upon the encapsulated query segments and bind variables and the passed select-root strings. A FHIR system level query spans multiple resource types, and therefore spans multiple tables in the database.
        Parameters:
        selectRoot - - The text of the outer SELECT ('SELECT' to 'FROM')
        subSelectRoot - - The text of the inner SELECT root to use in each sub-select
        addFinalClauses - - Indicates whether or not ordering and pagination clauses should be generated.
        Returns:
        SqlQueryData - contains the complete SQL query string and any associated bind variables.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • buildFromClause

        protected String buildFromClause()
                          throws Exception
        Builds the FROM clause for the SQL query being generated. The appropriate Resource and Parameter table names are included along with an alias for each table.
        Returns:
        A String containing the FROM clause
        Throws:
        Exception

      • buildWhereClause

        protected String buildWhereClause()
        Builds the WHERE clause for the query being generated. This method aggregates the contained query segments, and ties those segments back to the appropriate parameter table alias.
        Returns:

      • isSystemLevelSearch

        protected boolean isSystemLevelSearch()
        Returns:
        true if this instance represents a FHIR system level search

      • addPaginationClauses

        protected void addPaginationClauses​(StringBuilder queryString)
                             throws Exception
        Adds the appropriate pagination clauses to the passed query string buffer, based on the type of database we're running against.
        Parameters:
        queryString - A query string buffer.
        Throws:
        Exception
